description: Software-as-a-service for businesses - productivity, operations, analytics

examples.title: Meeting Cost Calculator with Live Dashboard

facets.audience: Engineering managers and finance teams at companies with 50+ employees
facets.jtbd: Quantify meeting overhead in dollars to justify calendar audits and async culture
facets.differentiator: Real-time dashboard showing meeting costs by team, integrates with HRIS for salary data
facets.distribution: CFO/VP Eng LinkedIn content, partnership with calendar tools (Calendly, Cal.com)

examples.why_good: Quantifiable ROI (dollars saved), clear buyer (VP Eng/CFO), topical (remote work debate), integration moat
examples.score_rationale: Moderate feasibility (needs calendar API integrations), good differentiation (cost focus is unique), decent market (all companies have meetings)

examples.title: Onboarding Checklist Builder with Progress Analytics

facets.audience: HR teams and people ops at growing startups (20-200 employees)
facets.jtbd: Reduce new hire ramp time with structured, trackable onboarding that adapts to role
facets.differentiator: Role-specific templates with branching logic, integrates with Slack/Teams for nudges
facets.monetization: Free for 10 employees, $8/employee/mo for unlimited with analytics
facets.distribution: HR community newsletters, partnership with ATS providers (Lever, Greenhouse)

examples.why_good: Clear pain (onboarding is chaos), specific buyer (HR/People Ops), measurable outcome (time-to-productivity)
examples.score_rationale: High feasibility (checklist app is straightforward), moderate differentiation (many onboarding tools exist), good clarity
